blog.name: autisticravenclaw
blog.title: An Autistic Ravenclaw's thoughts
blog.description:
Ravenclaw, INTJ, Autistic, 5w6, Thunderbird
Basically just thoughts and headcanons

body:
No. 34

A Ravenclaw founds the world’s first Wizarding University, where people can go to specialise in magic subjects and learn further than what is offered at school. Although this isn’t especially necessary for the wizarding society in terms of jobs, it offers the ability for people to study things they’re interested in.

blog.description: A Jcink advertising and help blog.

summary: A huge anniversary for Australia’s least-loved wizarding school, and a ministry determined to address the “troublesome” nature...
caption:
A huge anniversary for Australia’s least-loved wizarding school, and a ministry determined to address the “troublesome” nature of the disadvantaged young witches and wizards unable to afford places at the prestigious private magical schools.

It really is a long way to the top, if you want to rock and roll.

Students. Professors. Quidditch. Duelling. Ministry. Find your place in an open plot structure that really allows each character to have an impact. 

Backed by a friendly and welcoming OOC community with strong community values, Tallygarunga is the RP home away from home. Welcoming members 18+, with no requirement to know much about Harry Potter, or Australia!

TALLYGARUNGA

Regret nothing.

HOME | RULES | CREATION GUIDE | DISCORD

blog.name: letyourimaginationrun
blog.title: I'm sorry I'm on hiatus
blog.description: ⚡REQUESTS:CLOSED🍁Autumn Baby|Bio and Psych Major|Chem Minor|Undergrad Pre-med Student|Wells Trash Trio|Reader-Insert Fic Writer|Gif-maker|Side-blog: @lightningstrike-gifs|The Flash|Marvel|Supergirl|Legends of Tomorrow| Potterverse|FBAWTFT|RWBY|ADOW|Riverdale|Sherlock|The Magicians|The Carrie Diaries|The Good Place|Dynasty

tags: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
summary: Headcanon: Dating Harry Potter would include...
title: Headcanon: Dating Harry Potter would include...
body:
**A/N: The picture/edit/gif does not belong to me. It belongs to its rightful owner(s).

  • Compliments, so many compliments
  • Exchanging sneaky glances to each other during class
  • Of course he sends you a wink when your eyes meet
  • Which isn’t very subtle and it causes you to silently giggle
  • Snape smacking the back of Harry’s head when he catches him during Potions
  • “I’d appreciate it Mr. Potter if you stopped making googly-eyes across the room”
  • Helping him with his homework that he’s procrastinated
  • You end up tutoring him most of the time
  • “If you can get your Transfiguration homework done, then I’ll give you a reward”
  • Him giving you that cheeky little smile
  • Usually because of Voldemort or some sort of hunch he has
  • Trusting his hunches and gut feeling
  • Especially when its about Voldemort and the Death Eaters
  • This boi teaching you all the defensive spells he knows
  • You gladly and willing to learn
  • Learning the Patronus charm and casting it spectacularly
  • Both of your Patronus dances around you both along with his
  • “Now just keep your arm straight and-”
  • “Maintain a firm grasp on my wand while I say the incantation”
  • Giving him space when he needs it
  • Harry always finds himself back to you for comforting hugs
  • Sometimes Harry will fall asleep on your shoulder
  • His hair’s so messy and silky that you can’t help but run your finger’s through it
  • Being best friends with Ron and Hermione
  • And the Weasley family
  • And the Order of the Phoenix
  • The Weasley family loving you so much
  • Helping him with DA meetings
  • Harry asking you to help him with organizing what other spells to teach
  • Cheering him on during Quidditch season
  • Being his good luck charm before a match
  • So many small kisses when you two study
  • Staying up all night just talking and cuddling
  • Harry is a cuddler, whether he wants to admit it or not
  • Dumbledore approving of you, his eyes twinkling when he sees you two
  • So does Sirius and Remus
  • “Oo, snarky. You caught yourself a fiesty one Harry”
  • “Sirius, be nice”
  • “But Remus, doesn’t she remind you of Lily”
  • Most of the time you and Harry just blush and roll your eyes at Sirius’s innuendos
  • Defending Harry against all the accusations thrown at him
  • Worrying about him all the time
  • “Please be careful”
  • “I will. For you, I will”
  • He also worries about you because you matter the most to him
  • To Harry, you’re a sort of safe haven
  • Both of you caring and watching each other’s backs

blog.name: thequeenofuselessinformation
blog.title: The Queen of Useless Information
blog.description:
Yeah writing and drawing are my passions, but have you ever seen Tony Stark™️

Slytherin | Gemini | ENTJ | Greek/Serbian

body:
A very Harry Potter revelation

Scrolling through some gifs I came across the infamous lines

“Do you plan on joining magical law miss Granger”

“No, I intend to actually do Some good to the world” (paraphrasing)

And i realised that at age 7, when I had yet to read the books or see the movies to that extent- i was asked the same thing.

“You plan on becoming a lawyer miss chatterbox?” My 3rd grade teacher had asked humorously.

And to her horror or perhaps amusement, that walking entity of sass of a child had replied “No, I would rather do something useful for the world and not waste myself”

So we can safely assume that I had a good base of Hermione Granger Sass beforehand, a mantle to pass down later. Thanks for coming to my TEDtalk

summary: Barty, its good to see you take charge but dont you think youre being a little too harsh...
question: Barty, its good to see you take charge but dont you think youre being a little too harsh...
answer: Barty: I’m only joking around with him. I can’t go for two weeks sleeping in the same bed as Reg and NOT do stuff with him. That would be practically impossible.

summary: Moodboard Requests I’ll be taking moodboard requests for the following fandoms below :D (Anons welcome!) Be as detailed as you...
body:
Moodboard Requests

I’ll be taking moodboard requests for the following fandoms below :D

(Anons welcome!)

Be as detailed as you want with colors, relationships, moods, etc.

FANDOMS (including characters):

  • Harry Potter
  • Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
  • Star Wars
  • Disney
  • Doctor Who
  • The BBC’s Sherlock
  • The Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Pirates of the Caribbean
  • Ocean’s Trilogy
  • Moulin Rouge
  • La La Land
  • The Good Doctor
  • The Crown
  • Dirk Gently’s Holistic Detective Agency
  • iTV’s Victoria
  • Riverdale

SHIPS

  • Dramione (Draco Malfoy x Hermione)
  • Jacqueenie (Jacob Kowalski x Queenie Goldstein)
  • Reylo (Rey x Kylo Ren/Ben Solo)
  • Amory (Amy Pond x Rory Williams)
  • Euriarty (Eurus Holmes x Jim Moriarty)
  • Molliarty (Molly Hooper x Jim Moriarty)
  • Valki (Valkyrie x Loki)
  • Vicbert (Queen Victoria x Prince Albert)
  • Choni (Cheryl Blossom x Toni Topaz)

OTHERS

  • Hogwarts Houses
  • Hogwarts Hybrid Houses
  • Sorting non-Harry Potter Characters into Hogwarts Houses
  • The Rebellion
  • The First Order
  • Southside Serpents

COUPLES

  • Unfortunately, I do not do these. I’m very sorry.

Feel free to ask for anything I might not have listed on here! :D

Edit: School’s kicked in, so moodboards might churn out a bit slower than usual. I’m really sorry, but thanks for being patient!💛🌻

“Sometimes the future changes quickly and completely, and we’re left only with the choice of what to do next. We can choose to be afraid of it. To stand there, trembling. Not moving. Assuming the worst that can happen. Or we step forward into the unknown and assume it will be brilliant.”Cristina Yang (Sandra Oh)
Grey’s Anatomy 10x24 “Fear (of the Unknown)”

summary: Name: Agni Varma  FC: Dev Patel Age/DOB: TBD Gender/Pronouns: Male, He/Him/His Blood Status: Half-blood College: College of...
caption:
Name: Agni Varma

FC: Dev Patel

Age/DOB: TBD

Gender/Pronouns: Male, He/Him/His

Blood Status: Half-blood

College: College of Education and Human Performance

Major: Exceptional Student Magical Education

School Status: Sophomore

RSO: TBD

Background:

Having dyslexia and trying to learn magic was difficult for Agni. Teachers thought that he was stupid or lazy but really he just got the names of spells confused. The Varmas were very supportive of their son and when they realized what was happening they decided to homeschool him instead. Both of his parents had gone to Mahoutokoro School of Magic in Japan and they had been so excited for him when he was accepted. They had also been nervous about sending him off to school all on his own and that anxiety seemed to be realized when they decided to take him out of school. Agni was heartbroken at the fact that he would have to leave his friends and school behind all because some professors weren’t as understanding as they should be. He tried to argue with his parents that other professors had been trying to help him work around his dyslexia, but they were having none of it. They truly just wanted the best for their son and thought that if he got one-on-one training with tutors that they hired that he would do better.

When it was time for Agni to decide whether he would continue his education his parents wanted him to stay at home and work at the family business. When he told them that he wanted to go off to school in America his mother was highly upset. She was scared that he would fall behind again because of his dyslexia. Agni tried to assure her that all the tutors and all of the work she had put in to educating him all those years had prepared him for university. He had learned how to work with his dyslexia and even if sometimes there were some missteps Agni knew how to recover. After his experience in mainstream school, Agni wanted to learn how to work with exceptional students to make sure that everybody got the chance to learn. He knew he was lucky that his parents had the money to educate him on their own, but what about other students who had to rely on public education? How many students had been left behind by educators who just assumed the worse? Agni wanted to start a change in the world of magical education and he would work hard to do so.
